ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: It s only worked for me when I hit the button.  It does seem to go up fast though.  It s fairly easy to max. ... From:	ug@unixgeek.com [mailto:ug@unixgeek.com]
ygData.messageBody:
It's only worked for me when I hit the button. It does seem to go up fast
though. It's fairly easy to max.

-----Original Message-----
From: ug@... [mailto:ug@...]
Sent: Friday, April 28, 2000 8:25 AM
To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?

Currey, Mick writes:

> BTW, I love my new Iksar monk!

I've read the sneak thing too; never tried it.

Question though:

When you get your sneak skill and train 1 point in to it,
can you hit
sneak, walk up to a wall, hit autorun and go eat dinner and
just have
it raise on its own? Or is the skill check made only when
you hit the
button?
